name: Amazon S3
description: Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) is an object storage service that offers scalability, data availability, security, and performance

name: Docker on Amazon EC2 Linux
description: Use Docker, a popular container orchestration software, on Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2).

name: Amazon EC2 Linux
description: Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) is a web service that provides resizable compute capacity in the cloud

name: Amazon Sagemaker
description: Amazon SageMaker is a fully managed service that provides the ability to build, train, and deploy ML models

name: RStudio
description: RStudio provides free and open source tools for R and enterprise-ready professional software for data science teams to develop and share their work at scale.

name: Amazon EC2 Windows
description: Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) is a web service that provides secure, resizable compute capacity in the cloud.

name: Ubuntu 20 04 on Amazon EC2
description: Use Ubuntu 20.04, on Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2).

name: Nextflow Advanced
description: Use the scalability of AWS Batch to run Nextflow workflows. This is ideal for large workloads and larger data-sets.

name: Cromwell Advanced
description: Use the scalability of AWS Batch to run Cromwell workflows. This is ideal for large workloads and larger data-sets.

name: PCluster
description: Easy to deploy High Performance Computing based on AWS ParallelCluster 3.0 which supports AWS Batch and Slurm schedulers

name: FSx For Lustre
description: Sets up an FSX for Lustre filesystem with PERSISTENT_1 deployment type using SSD storage

name: NICE DCV on Amazon EC2 Linux
description: NICE DCV is a high-performance remote display protocol using which the customers can run graphics-intensive applications remotely on EC2 instances, and stream their user interface to simpler client machines, eliminating the need for expensive dedicated workstations. The user can connect to the DCV server by using the RG Connect URL button. The user name is ec2-user and password is the Instance ID.

name: Amazon EFS
description: Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) provides a simple, serverless, set-and-forget elastic file system for use with AWS Cloud services and on-premises resources.

name: Amazon EBS volume
description: Amazon EBS volume is a durable, block-level storage device that you can attach to your instances. After you attach a volume to an instance, you can use it as you would use a physical hard drive.

name: VS Code
description: Visual Studio Code is a lightweight but powerful source code editor which runs on an EC2 Linux machine and is accessed via the browser. It comes with built-in support for JavaScript, TypeScript, and Node.js and has a rich ecosystem of extensions for other languages and runtimes (such as C++, C#, Java, Python, PHP, Go, and .NET).

name: Jupyterlab
description: JupyterLab 3.5.0 web-based interactive development environment for notebooks, code, and data. Configure and arrange workflows in data science and machine learning.

name: Integrated Genomics Viewer
description: The Integrative Genomics Viewer (IGV) is a high-performance, easy-to-use, interactive tool for the visual exploration of genomic data.

name: Secure Research Linux Desktop
description: A secure research environment intended to allow researchers to access sensitive data under a higher level of control and data protection.
